item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a Python & Go–based AI backend developer and a 2025 B.Tech Computer Engineering graduate based in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. I focus on building scalable backend systems and AI-driven services that work under real-world constraints like performance, reliability, and deployment complexity.

What I work on

  • Design and build backend microservices using Python and Go
  • Develop and integrate REST APIs for data-intensive and AI-powered applications
  • Work with cloud platforms and managed services for deployment and scalability
  • Build AI systems involving retrieval, agents, and real-time inference
  • Debug and optimize distributed systems and data pipelines

Technical Skills

Languages: Go, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS,
